meta.title: From FOOD to CHAIN
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: The Tour de France is this week and weâ€™re honoring it with bike-themed Raddles. Like a well-oiled bicycle chain, a food chain keeps things in an ecosystem chugging along. The concept of food chains was developed first by al-Jahiz, an 8th-century scholar in modern-day Iraq, and was later independently developed by an English ecologist named Charles Elton.
